resources.string: Press on color below to apply
Enable or disable network speed indicators
Show the network traffic indicator arrows
Hides the global actions menu on secure lockscreen
Show charging current, voltage, wattage and battery temperature on lockscreen while charging
Shows an animation while reading your finger
Control visibility of status bar icons
Double tap to sleep on statusbar
Double tap on statusbar to switch the screen off.\nNotes: Requires a SystemUI restart
Double tap on the lock screen to put the device to sleep.\nNotes: Requires a SystemUI restart

Battery light in Do Not Disturb mode

Disable heads up from these applications

Choose which system navigation style to use

Must be in DateFormat eg. MM/dd/yy
Display an animation when the device is plugged in
Disable expanding quick settings on secure lock screens

Open quick settings when there are %1$s notifications

Quickly disable heads up for all apps but keep them enabled for dialer and messaging apps
Show a kill app button in the notification\'s longpress menu
Display and customize battery bar near status bar or navigation bar
Blend full/empty colors corresponding to battery percentage
Full → empty: red ← green ← blue ← red
Full → empty: red → green → blue → red

Prevent interaction with navigation buttons while the screen is being touched
Automatically turn on for these apps
Gaming mode will turn on automatically when these apps are opened and turn off when they are closed
Block all headsup notifications except calls & alarms

Block all headsup notifications except calls

These are power saving features. They may interfere with services intended to run at idle, like navigation apps. You can whitelist these apps from being affected in the app battery settings.
